readability_reflection: I would say string interpolation is more readable especially when the level of complexity increased.
comprehension_debugging: Yes, it helps with what the expected output will look like and how each variable represent themselves.
preference_rationale: I would choose string interpolation due to being easier of readability,  and compared to concatenation seems to be easier to update or reorder the variable.
learning_curve: At first it was simple and intuitive but than more variables and number were making it complex but with the provided code examples I feel much faster at reading the code and understanding it intuitively.
suggestions_improvement: Encourage multiline support when using multiple lines of interpolation and for readability color coded variables could be more clearer form of syntax
